name: Bubble Levels
description:
Loved playing the old arcade games in different modes? Can’t get enough of exciting, fun game puzzles?
Then this app is just perfect for you!

Download today Bubble Levels and discover exciting new challenges and levels. One thing you’ll love about this awesome game is that you can start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited. What are you waiting for? Install and play our awesome game today- It is a fun and free game entertaining for all ages.

Unlock levels, pop bubbles and win game modes.
Your goal is to hit and break all the bubbles and balloons, clear the board and beat all the stages in this relaxing bubble shooter puzzle game. Follow the steps, and use incredible power-ups in every level, great brain teaser game. Play everywhere, anywhere and as much as you want. No internet connection is required. The longer you play, the more addicted you’ll get. Aim and blast away all the balls in this colorful puzzle adventure.

Enjoy the Best Bubble Levels features!
• Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
• Match at least 3 balloons of the same color to create a line blast and pop the group.
• Use your skills to beat all the challenges to win coins and reach high scores.
• Fewer moves you pass a level, the higher score you'll get on each stage.
• Avoid bubble clusters by planning your moves. Form a strategy to clear all the balls and pop your way up to victory.
• Complete the challenging brain missions and reach the level target.
• Use your logic and color-matching skills to overcome the obstacles and pop all the bubbles
• Play and enjoy an original gameplay mode.
• Bubble swap option is totally free. All you have to do is tap on the bubble to change its color. Swipe the bubbles and choose the color you need.
• Use special boosters and power-ups to advance! The BOMB and the FIREBALL will take out surrounding bubbles and cut through a safe pass.
• Challenge family and friends and see who can reach high scores and win the battle in this exciting bubble shooter.

Do you have a knack for logic and puzzles?
Bubble Levels is a perfect bubble shooter game to play when you want to relax and clear your mind. With fresh new items and graphics, an addictive game mode, cool boosters and tons of challenging levels, you just won’t put it down.

Get ready for a new bubble popping adventure!
